p: It was wonderful to receieve your letter Enid, adn I wish you could yourself look in on us now instead of just sitting up there writing to us.
Eveything is magical - The green is so green - the lilacs gorgeous and the little things such as pansies are growing so fast.

Daddy and Sig came home with splended reports as to the success of both. Dad is always marvelous, adn Sig is certainly doing very remarkable work in his own specialty. The head of the Music Dep, himself a pupil of the great men back East complimented Sig to the utmost
